plot: Ben falls under the hypnotic spell of a wicked hypnotist, whose evil grand scheme for ill-gotten gains gets an unexpected boost from some alien help.

The Tennysons stop by a Super Mall, where Ben participates in a hypnotist's show. The next day they find out something was stolen from the mall and an alien may be involved. That night they find Ben sleepwalking and causing havoc. Now team Tennyson must keep Ben awake to prevent more chaos and find out who's behind his sleepwalking.—Jesse Sanchez
